content.question: The ideas expressed in the excerpt best reflect which of the following historical processes?

choices.label: The desire to fund transportation improvements to settle the interior of North America
The persistence of aspects of African culture among enslaved people
The creation of alliances between Europeans and Native Americans
The transmission of Enlightenment ideals across the Atlantic

content.answer: The transmission of Enlightenment ideals across the Atlantic

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
